data.title: Nameless Places by edited by Gerald W. Page: Fine (1975) First Edition., Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - First Edition. - Hardcover - Arkham House, Sauk City - 1975 - Condition: Fine - Fine - Signed by contributor and editor Gerald W. Page, with an inscription, on the title page. Also signed by jacket artist, Tim Kirk, and with an original drawing by, Tim Kirk, on the title page. In original, unclipped ($7.50), jacket in protective sheet. Very light rubbing to front corners, otherwise very fine. Bound in black cloth over boards with gilded lettering on the spine. Solid, square, and very tightly bound. The interior is clean, clear, and crisp. A one-of-a-kind copy of this collection twenty-seven original stories with unique signatures. Pages:(8) 279 Dimensions:8¼ x 5½ x 1. - Nameless Places
data.text:
Shipping Terms:

Domestic shipments are typically sent via USPS Media Mail. If you are purchasing multiple books, we may reach out for additional shipping charges. Feel free to contact for an estimate at info@kerriositybooks.com.

International (non U.S.) shipments are sent via the United States Postal Service and are billed at cost. For an estimate of international shipping and insurance please contact us at info@kerriositybooks.com.

For large purchases or purchases requiring additional insurance or shipping requirements, please contact us at info@kerriositybooks.com.
